forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low -8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 18F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow developing during the afternoon. High -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High around 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers with snow becoming steadier and heavier late at night. Low near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with scattered snow showers and flurries becoming a steady accumulating snow later. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will mix with rain at times overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low 23F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
